synopsis.text: Murakami Takashi and Louis Vuitton join forces once more to bring us "Superflat First Love," an enchanting anime short celebrating their six-year collaboration and the revamp of the Multicolor Spring Palette line. Aya, a young schoolgirl, finds herself magically transported to a vibrant, abstract world by the whimsical Petit Panda. This time, she journeys back to Paris in 1897, where she encounters a young Gaston-Louis Vuitton. As the two share an undeniable connection, viewers are left wondering about the fate of their blossoming love. This captivating tale unfolds across Louis Vuitton stores and a Japanese mobile website, inviting fans to explore the enchanting world of Superflat First Love.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
